content: pm p24 24 26 pm p to end k =knit next row k to 1 stitch before marker kfb sm kfb k to 1 p = purl stitch before marker kfb sm kfb k to end 88 90 92 sl = slip_stitch next row p kfb = knit in the front and back of stitch repeat until you have 112 114 116 stitches on the k2tog = knit two stitches together needle ending with a knit row ssk = slip two stitches then knit them together p2tog = purl two stitches together first ear pm = place marker p to 3 stitches past first marker turn sm = slip marker s1 ssk k2tog k1 turn s1 p4 turn repeat two row four more times on last purl row do pattern not turn face opening cast on 80 82 84 stitches join in the round being care- second ear ful not to twist purl to 3 stitches past second marker turn work 8 rounds in k1 p1 ribbing s1 ssk k2tog k1 turn next round rib 12 stitches place these stitches on a s1 p4 turn holder repeat last two row four more times k3 4 6 * kfb k3 repeat from * to last 1 4 6 st k to end 84 86 88 back of head k to 1 stitch before second marker ssk removing mark- head you will now begin to work flat er turn beginning with a purl row work 10 12 13 row in stock- sl1 p to 1 stitch before remaining marker p2tog remov- ing stitch ing marker turn copyright statement pattern designed by valerie johnson wandering cat studio 2019 user may not copy and/or distribute pattern for profit or otherwise seamless kitty cat hat page 3 sl1 k to last stitch before previous turn ssk turn neck sl1 p to last stitch before previous turn p2tog turn with right side facing pick up and knit in 1-1 ribbing 24 repeat last two row 3 more times 26 28 stitches along the first side work in 1-1 ribbing sl1 k to 3 stitches before previous turn ssk x2 turn across the stitches from the holder pick up and work in sl1 p to 3 stitches before previous turn p2tog x2 turn 1-1 ribbing 25 27 29 stitches along the second side sl1 k to last stitch before previous turn ssk turn work in 1-1 ribbing over last 9s stitches working in the sl1 p to last stitch before previous turn p2tog turn round continue in ribbing for three inches and cast off repeat last f4rows until there are 9 stitches between turn loosely sew in ends wear and enjoy gaps sl1 k to last stitch before previous turn ssk turn sl1 pp to last stitch before previous turn p2tog turn repeat last 2 row until there are no more side stitches to incorporate thank you for downloading this pattern if you have any questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me at wanderingcatstudio@hotmail
